article.title: List_of_international_environmental_agreements

template.arg: Talk:Multilateral environmental agreement#Proposed merge with List of international environmental agreements

article.paragraph: This is alist ofmultilateral environmental agreementinternational environmental agreements.

Most of the following agreements are legally binding for countries that have formally ratified them. Some, such as theKyoto Protocol, differentiate between types of countries and each nation's respective responsibilities under the agreement.toc left-
article.heading: Alphabetical order
